body:
Hi Dan,


I don't know why you wouldn't use the rtrace -om option, but doing it  
your way, you just need the right syntax:


	rcalc -e '$1=if($3-2*$1-2*$2,1,0)' test.dat > test_res.dat


I chose these factors based on your material that reflects 5x as much  
blue as red and green.  The above should work for white illumination  
and assuming you don't have other blue materials in your scene.


Best,
-Greg
